subject: Medications for US residents
body:
Dear customer.
Do you shop for medications on the Web? You do? But do you know that 70% of Web-shoppers are regularly being sold fake medications? Protect yourself now choose a reliable online pharmacy.
At CanadianPharmacy you will be able to find all the drugs you shop for in your USA pharmacy. The only difference is that our drugs are 100% generic and are sold at a much lower price. CanadianPharmacy save together with our discount Canadian Web pharmacy.
Hope that you find this advice useful. CanadianPharmacy is waiting.
Yours faithfully,Morris Guthrie
